question: Analyze the technology adoption trends of companies in the healthcare industry over the last 5 years.

subtasks.task: Identify companies operating in the healthcare industry and retrieve their basic information and financial metrics.
Determine the technology stack used by identified healthcare companies, focusing on any emerging technologies adopted over the last 5 years.
Analyze vendor technologies or products adopted by healthcare companies to understand their partnerships and technology collaborations.
Examine the strategic technology focus areas for the healthcare companies to see their digital transformation initiatives and priorities.
Collect and analyze social media data related to healthcare companies to understand public engagement and sentiment towards their technology initiatives.
